refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: kasetup is a "all in one toolbox" to ease the installation.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: -checkdeployconf Check parameters of kadeploy configuration files.
-printvalidfdisk Generate a fdisk script from the configuration file, for the preinstall archive.
-sudowrapping Wrap kadeploy script into sudo mechanism and put the links in "/usr/local/bin/"
-copybinfiles Copy some required files in "/usr/local/bin/". It will be fix sooner.
-createtftp Copy some required files in the tftp repository. (pxelinux, memdisk...).

refentry.refsect1: CONFIGURATION FILE /etc/kadeploy/deploy.conf must be correctly written. /etc/kadeploy/clusterpartition.conf must be correctly written.
